## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> to replace calls to ifuncs with indirect calls.

This could be used to support ifunc on systems where the program loader does not natively support it. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> initializer uses of ifuncs are not handled.

Definition at line 19 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/lowerifunc-h">LowerIFunc.h</a>.
